attributes.additional_details: This is not an advertisment. Many people in the media have been knighted. David Attenburough with his timeless documeneries, and other sirs who have lately been found not to be so deserving. But on a lighter note, Jim Carrey is one who brings tears of laughter to millions and deserves a chance to have his title out in the world to put the creative, energetic, crazy attitude back into mankind. Again this is not to advertise, he is already a multimillionaire, this is a petition to benefit the spirit of mankind, and if that isnt reason for a petition to be created, I don't know what is!
